Crimes.Crime_Name: Submission of inauthentic documents for immigration purposes
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Fairness letter issued without full disclosure of evidence
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Applicant's documents deemed insufficient and lacking credibility
Evidence_Type: Demolition documents without proof of submission
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Submission of fraudulent documents in support of visa application
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Failure to provide authentic, verifiable documentation
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: None – applicant’s own evidence was incomplete and unverified
Crimes.Application_Factor: Use of forged or fabricated property documents
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Documents lacked dates, signatures, and proof of authenticity or submission
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Officer fulfilled duty by issuing a fairness letter
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant failed to substantiate claims with credible evidence
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claim that procedural fairness was breached due to non-disclosure of evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Adequacy of response to fairness concerns
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to provide complete and authenticated documents

Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Alleged breach of procedural fairness in misrepresentation finding
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Applicant informed of concerns via fairness letter
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Response deemed inadequate; lack of supporting proof
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: False information submitted through fraudulent documentation
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Failure to rebut allegations with sufficient evidence
Crimes.Application_Error: Misrepresentation through submission of false documents
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: None – applicant did not provide valid evidence to consider
Crimes.Application_Factor: Use of false documents to establish eligibility
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Compliance with procedural fairness in misrepresentation determination
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of dated, signed, or verifiable documentation
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Fairness requirements met through issuance of fairness letter
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Forged or fabricated property ownership documents
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Submitted materials lacked authenticity and verification
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Argument that officer failed to disclose specific evidence
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to authenticate or properly submit evidence
